articles.title: Modern Love Mumbai review: Amazon Prime series makes you fall in love with the city, all over again - The Indian Express
articles.description: Modern Love Mumbai review: This city is perhaps India’s only true ‘mahanagar’. The anthology may not inspire the same awed-affection as the Maximum City, but each story does have something uniquely Mumbai about it.
